content:
Any Python objects to be mapped for distributed networking should be imported here. A modified python syntax is used. In the first line DistributedObject.py and DistributedObjectAI.py will be mapped.

The /AI can also be used for module/filenames like this.

from someManager.DSomeManager/AI import DSomeManager/AI

This will import the DSomeManager class from someManager.DSomeManager.py and DSomeManagerAI from someManager.DsomeManagerAI.py.

Variables

int8, int16, int32, and int64: Signed integer values and bit size

uint8, uint16, uint32, and uint64: For unsigned integers

float64: A C double, for floating point numbers

string: An arbitrary string up to 64k in length. Obviously bandwidth intensive so avoid for frequent communication

char: Same as int8 but will be realized as a character

blob: String but arbitrary byte sequence usually not intended for print or something encoded that is too complicated for the normal dc system

Structures can also be identified as well.
